_header: I was in an summery dale
_description: The Owl and the Nightingale — 1794 lines in couplets

OxfJesus29.First Lines:
Ich wes in one sumere daleIn oneswiþe dyele
                    hale…
OxfJesus29.Last Lines:
…He can iceu namore telleher nys namore of þisse spelle
                        Explicit

BLCottCalAIX.First Lines:
Ich ƿas in one sumere daleIn one suþe diȝele
                    hale…
BLCottCalAIX.Last Lines:
…Ne chan Ich eu namore telleHer nis namore of þis
                    spelle
